pullRequest.title: FCREPO-3431 - Implement getChildren
pullRequest.bodyText:
JIRA Ticket: https://jira.lyrasis.org/browse/FCREPO-3431
What does this Pull Request do?

Implements getChildren for FedoraResource, Container and ResourceFactory
All ContainmentIndex methods now take FedoraIds instead of FedoraResource.
Deprecates unused getChild method (which seems modeshape oriented)

How should this be tested?
New tests were added. No functional changes.

commit.message: Switch containment index methods to take FedoraIds instead of FedoraResources
Implements getChildren for ResourceFactory, FedoraResource, and Container

nodes.bodyText: I think this can be removed, I'm just reading code on my phone so I could be mistaken.
I'd vote to just remove it and not deprecate it, either that or at least return one child because the method is totally useless otherwise.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -142,6 +142,7 @@
      * @param relPath the given path
      * @return the child of this resource
      */
+    @Deprecated

nodes.bodyText: When I say its useless, I mean because it is just returning null right now
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -142,6 +142,7 @@
      * @param relPath the given path
      * @return the child of this resource
      */
+    @Deprecated

nodes.bodyText: 🤦  I looked at these 5 lines for like 5 minutes and still couldn't get them correct in my mind. You are correct, please disregard my previous comment.
Same as above, don't need to prefix with FEDORA_ID_PREFIX + "/", can reduce to just FedoraId.create() with the UUID.
Same as above, don't need to prefix with FEDORA_ID_PREFIX + "/", can reduce to just FedoraId.create() with the UUID.
Same as above, don't need to prefix with FEDORA_ID_PREFIX + "/", can reduce to just FedoraId.create() with the UUID.

commit.message: Remove unused getChild method. Remove unnecessary prefix additions in tests
